lead_paragraph: Frank Lampard scored three goals and New York City FC beat 10-man Colorado 5-1 on Saturday to end the Rapids' 15-game unbeaten streak.

headline.print_headline: Lampard's Hat Trick Leads NYCFC Over Rapids 5-1
headline.main: Lampard's Hat Trick Leads NYCFC Over Rapids 5-1

snippet: Frank Lampard scored three goals and New York City FC beat 10-man Colorado 5-1 on Saturday to end the Rapids' 15-game unbeaten streak....
